relation: #2. I take the EFT to Panther hollow from downtown. If I’m tired, in a hurry, or its raining I put my bike on a bus. I love the looks from the bus drivers who’ve been wondering what the racks were for. From the south side I take the hot metal bridge to panther hollow.
